channel.title: Help For Editing EasyRSC. All experienced members please post!
channel.description: Hi guys. So if anyone wants to ask q's about editing easyrsc. Ask the question and maybe someone will replie. So yeah, i'm new so I can't anser mutch questions. The only thing I can anser is a little about the control pannle ( exp, items, bank items) thats about it. :cool:

item.title: Help For Editing EasyRSC. All experienced members please post!
item.dc:creator: @iTroll iTroll
item.description:
@iTroll wrote:

[quote=“adventurescape, post:14, topic:276965”]if you want to know how to edit it, just go zoom around in the folders until you find a wordpad named mudclient.java and edit it and rename to your server

I need like a rsc server ip changer!!! :eek:

         ~AdventureScape  ;D[/quote]To change your ip u can unplug your router and plug it back in.

Read full topic

item.title: Help For Editing EasyRSC. All experienced members please post!
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

What ever you edit in the ItemsDef.xml file, edit the same in Items.rscd file (client side).

Also, it’s YONG, not YOUNG ffs.

Read full topic

Hi guys. So if anyone wants to ask q’s about editing easyrsc. Ask the question and maybe someone will replie.
So yeah, i’m new so I can’t anser mutch questions. The only thing I can anser is a little about the control pannle ( exp, items, bank items) thats about it.

[/quote]Or they can check this EasyRSC editing tutorial made my Yong Min. - http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html
